title: Ethereum Foundation, Vitalik Buterin Dumps 15K ETH; Will History Repeat? - CoinGape
summary: Ethereum Foundation and Vitalik Buterin have collectively sold over 15,000 ETH, worth around $25 million, to a crypto exchange. This has sparked fears of a potential price drop in ETH. Historical data suggests that large moves by the Ethereum Foundation have led to significant price drops in the past. Vitalik Buterin has also sold meme coins in the past, which have lost value after his dump. The current price of ETH is around $1,800, down 3% in the last 24 hours. Trading volume has increased by 52% in the same period.

title: Vitalik Buterin and ETH Foundation Sell $30 Million in Ethereum As ETH About to Break $2,000 - U.Today
summary: Vitalik Buterin and the Ethereum Foundation have sold a total of $30 million worth of Ethereum (ETH) on a major exchange, with Buterin transferring 200 ETH and the Foundation moving 15,000 ETH. This comes as ETH is on the cusp of breaking $2,000, with flows to crypto exchanges reaching an eight-month high and active deposits of ETH to exchanges at their highest level since November last year. Additionally, a record amount of ETH was burned at the end of the week.

title: Ethereum [ETH]: Dipping prices, rising negative sentiments and everything in between - AMBCrypto News
summary:
Here is a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

Ethereum's [ETH] Shapella upgrade has led to a decline in active validator count on the proof-of-stake network, with a significant increase in validators withdrawing their ETH coins. This has caused ETH's value to dip, with a 14% increase followed by a 11% decrease in price. Despite this, ETH whales with large holdings have intensified accumulation. Market sentiment has also turned negative, with a weighted sentiment score of -1.172.

title: Crypto Goal! Major Euro Football Club Now Accepts Bitcoin & Ethereum - CCN.com
summary: Benfica, a major Euro football club, has announced that it will start accepting Bitcoin and Ethereum payments for match tickets and club merchandise. This is the first time a football club has accepted cryptocurrency as a regular payment method. The move comes after the club partnered with UTRUST, a crypto payments processing firm, to use its technology and reduce processing fees. Benfica CEO Domingos Soares de Oliveira said the decision to accept crypto payments was made to stay ahead of the curve and recognize that many supporters are now digital users first. This move marks a significant step in the growing partnership between football and cryptocurrency, with other clubs and footballing legends also embracing the technology.

title: How to check an Ethereum transaction — TradingView News - TradingView
summary:
How to check an Ethereum transaction's status:

1. Select an Ethereum blockchain explorer (e.g. Etherscan, Ethplorer, or Blockchain.com)
2. Enter the transaction hash into the explorer's search field
3. Click the "search" or "enter" button
4. Check if the transaction was successful or not by looking for "success" or "successful" in the transaction details

Why check a transaction's status?

* To confirm whether a transaction was successful or failed
* To see how many blocks have been created since the transaction was added to the chain
* To monitor network congestion and cost
* To determine if the gas fee paid was sufficient for the transaction to be confirmed
* To track the timestamp, block confirmations, transaction fee, ETH price, base fee, gas limit, and nonce of a transaction

By checking a transaction's status, traders can optimize their spending habits and network usage, and ensure smooth Ethereum transactions when sending and receiving funds or deploying smart contracts.

title: Why did Ethereum price go up today - CoinJournal
summary: Ethereum price surged today due to a broader market rebound, with the total cryptocurrency market cap reaching $1.27 trillion. ETH price rose 6% within hours, breaking above $2,000, a key technical level. Bitcoin also saw a 3% price increase, taking bulls closer to the coveted $30k level. The positive sentiment in the market was fueled by a rebound in US equities, with the S&P 500, Dow Jones Industrial Average, and Nasdaq all closing higher. Memecoin mania also contributed to the price increase, with listings on Binance driving gains for Pepe and Floki Inu. However, the coming week will be crucial as investors assess April's CPI report and evaluate the impact on interest rates.

title: Ethereum (ETH) Diamond Hands Set New Record as ETH Price Reconquers $2,000 - U.Today
summary: Ethereum (ETH) long-term holders set a new record, with 74% of the circulating supply held by wallets that haven't moved in over 155 days. This is up from 67% in December. The increase is likely due to the FTX collapse, as mature coins are now being included in the LTH metric. Despite this, ETH price rejected at $2,000 and is struggling to hold above $1,900.

title: 'First Meme Coin on L2 Will Shift This Equilibrium,' Ethereum (ETH) Veteran Comments on New Hype - U.Today
summary:
Sure! Here's a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

First meme coin on Ethereum's L2 could lead to a shift in equilibrium, according to Kain Warwick, a seasoned DeFi developer. The popularity of Uniswap showed that FOMO-based high-risk traders are willing to pay high fees to get in on new projects. As meme coins like Pepe rally on L2 networks, newbie users may learn to use cross-network bridges to move their value to new chains, potentially leading to a shift in the crypto market. The article mentions that the Ethereum network became almost unusable due to high fees amid the euphoria around Pepe's Binance listing, suggesting that the coin's price movement may have peaked.

title: Prominent Hedge Fund North Rock Digital Founder Calls Ethereum (ETH) 'Unquestioned Arena for Almost All Large Players' - U.Today
summary: Hal Press, founder of North Rock Digital, believes that Ethereum (ETH) has become an "unquestioned arena" for top-tier on-chain players due to years of hard work by its developers, not just short-term speculative catalysts. He praised the Ethereum (ETH) developers for their high-quality work and highlighted the successful Shanghai upgrade as a key factor in ETH's supremacy. The Shapella upgrade, which includes the Shanghai upgrade, has made it possible to withdraw Ethers (ETH) from the proof-of-stake deposit contract, considered a crucial milestone in ETH's journey from proof of work to proof-of-stake consensus. Analysts have released bullish predictions for the event, with some predicting a maximum potential damage of 8% for the ETH price.

title: Ethereum Competitor Avalanche (AVAX) Partners With Chinese Tech Giant Alibaba Cloud on New ‘Cloudverse’ Project - The Daily Hodl
summary: Avalanche (AVAX), a competitor to Ethereum (ETH), has partnered with Chinese tech giant Alibaba Cloud to create a new virtual space called Cloudverse. This partnership will allow businesses and brands to easily deploy customized metaverses and unlock new dimensions for consumers. Avalanche will provide metaverse-building solutions, while Alibaba Cloud will provide the digital infrastructure. The partnership aims to offer millions of consumer-facing businesses a quick and low-overhead way to enter the Web3 space. Avalanche will also provide support on visuals, meta-economics, interactive functions, events, and continued operations. The partnership is an extension of a previous deal struck between Avalanche and Alibaba Cloud in December 2022. Avalanche is trading at $17.41 at time of writing, a 2.2% gain in the last 24 hours.

title: What the recent meme coin pump means for Bitcoin and Ethereum - FXStreet
summary:
Here is a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

Meme coin rallies may signal a top in Bitcoin and Ethereum prices, according to experts. Recent price rallies in meme coins such as PEPE and Shiba-Inu-themed coins have gained significant gains for holders. Meme coin peaks are correlated with Bitcoin and Ethereum peaks, and the current rally may catalyze capital rotation into other assets. The analyst believes the top is either in or near, and meme coin profits could rotate into other cryptocurrencies, blockchain gaming, and NFTs.

title: Cardano NFTs grow from strength to strength – enough to flip Ethereum and Solana? - AMBCrypto News
summary: Cardano NFTs are gaining momentum, with the market cap of ADA reaching $16.98 million in Q4 2022 and reaching a YTD high of $16.98 million on 18 March. Despite slow starts to the year, Cardano NFTs have picked up momentum, with Lace.io, the first native wallet, launching on 14 April. Cardano NFTs have the potential to challenge the dominance of Ethereum and Solana, but their success depends on various factors such as network adoption, developer support, and user demand.
